content: this legal case involves multiple parties and various disputes over property ownership lease contracts and financial compensation the court has made several decisions based on the evidence and relevant laws in one case the plaintiff is granted sole ownership of a property and the defendant is ordered to pay monetary compensation in another case the defendant is ordered to compensate the plaintiff for expenses related to joint and separate property the court also addresses a debt related to construction works and determines that it should be divided between the parties the court considers the evidence and arguments presented by both parties to reach its decisions overall the court divides properties determines compensation amounts and addresses loan obligations the final financial compensation is calculated after a setoff and each party is responsible for their own procedural costs
